title: Function
description: A function to be used in the IDE

expression.description: Indicates if the function is an expression or normal function

label.description: The label for the function, as shown in the IDE

category.description: The category by which the functions are grouped and shown in the sidebar.

icon.__comment: The available icons are defined by a set we have available in our framework.
icon.description: The icon to be displayed in the IDE for this function.

context.description: Determines the context in which the function is utilized, thereby offering context-specific options.

options.description: The options that you want configured for the action. These can be referred by name inside the function

paths.description: The paths that you want configured for the action step.

yields.description: Determines whether the function can have other functions nested and if so, what the behaviour should be for executing those functions

functionName.description: The name of the function that is exported in the wit file

name.description: The name of the interface set in the wit file

package.description: The name of the package defined in the wit file, like: example:my-package@0.1.0
